attributes.comment:
Hello. We are Claire and Keith Royer. We live in Steamboat Springs, CO and
began the exciting and arduous process of adopting a child from China one year
ago. After a five month paperchase, our dossier arrived in China 8/1/06. We now,
along with many, many other families, are prepared for the long and hopeful wait to
reach our child. We consider it a labor of love and will do whatever it takes to bring
our child home. This is not an easy task. There are many obstacles still to
overcome and we are prepared to meet them with enthusiam. This is where we
need your help. Please help to alleviate the financial strains of this process by
NOT increasing fees. It would be a tremendous help to all families working to bring
their children home. Thank you for your consideration in this matter. We trust your
decision will be in the best interest of these children and their families.
Sincerely,
Claire and Keith Royer
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Claire E. Royer
